title: Natural Language Understanding for Voice Commands
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to understand my varied speech patterns and accent so that I can interact with it easily without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Medication Reminders Through Voice Commands
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to set medication reminders using voice commands so that I can manage my health efficiently without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Contextual Assistance for Daily Tasks
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to provide step-by-step guidance for tasks like setting medication reminders or making video calls, so that I can manage my health and stay connected without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Voice Feedback and Confirmation
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide clear voice feedback and confirmation after completing my tasks so that I feel confident that my commands were understood and executed correctly.

title: Rephrasing Assistance for Clarity
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to provide options for rephrasing my commands when they are unclear so that I can feel more confident using the system without frustration.

title: Personalized Interaction History
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to remember my past interactions and preferences so that I can receive tailored suggestions that help me manage my health and stay connected with my family more easily.

title: Multimodal Interaction Support for Enhanced Usability
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to use voice commands along with visual cues so that I can feel more confident and supported while interacting with the system, making it easier to manage my tasks and stay connected with my family.

title: Adaptive Learning and Improvement – Learning User Preferences Over Time
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to learn my preferences over time so that it can provide personalized reminders and recommendations for my health and social activities, making it easier for me to manage my daily tasks and stay connected with my family.
